xmlquery.searchRoleMenuLike: Select * from smhris_role_menu where idRole like ?
xmlquery.roleMenuDelete: Delete from smhris_role_menu where idRole = ? and idMenu = ?
xmlquery.roleMenuEdit: Update smhris_role_menu set idRole=?,idMenu=? where idRole=? and idMenu=?
xmlquery.menuListByIdRole: select a.idMenu, a.description, a.href, if(isnull(b.idRole),"","checked") as idRole from smhris_menu a left join (select * from smhris_role_menu where idRole=?) b on a.idMenu = b.idMenu
